history.proof: intros A P H a. apply H. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Set) (P : list A -> Prop), (forall x : list A, (forall y : list A, length y < length x -> P y) -> P x) -> forall a : list A, P a

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
Relation_Operators.Ltl_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P nil (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
Relation_Operators.Desc_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> SProp), P nil -> (forall x : A, P (x :: nil)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> P (l ++ y :: nil) -> P ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA l -> P l
Forall_Exists_dec : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> forall l : list A, {Forall P l} + {Exists (fun x : A => ~ P x) l}
is_set_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), is_set A l -> P l -> ~ In x l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, is_set A l -> P l
Add_ind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall l : list A, P l (a :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> forall l l0 : list A, Add a l l0 -> P l l0
Forall_dec : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> forall l : list A, {Forall P l} + {~ Forall P l}
Permutation_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Permutation l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), P (y :: x :: l) (x :: y :: l)) -> (forall l l' l'' : list A, Permutation l l' -> P l l' -> Permutation l' l'' -> P l' l'' -> P l l'') -> forall l l0 : list A, Permutation l l0 -> P l l0
NoDup_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, NoDup l -> P l
Add_sind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall l : list A, P l (a :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> forall l l0 : list A, Add a l l0 -> P l l0
neg_Forall_Exists_neg : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), (forall x : A, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> ~ Forall P l -> Exists (fun x : A => ~ P x) l
ForallOrdPairs_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> SProp), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), Forall (R a) l -> ForallOrdPairs R l -> P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, ForallOrdPairs R l -> P l
Forall_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (Q : list A -> Type), Q nil -> (forall (b : A) (l : list A), P b -> Q (b :: l)) -> forall l : list A, Forall P l -> Q l
Forall_inv : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (a : A) (l : list A), Forall P (a :: l) -> P a
Inductive Ltl (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) : list A -> list A -> Prop := Lt_nil : forall (a : A) (x : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA nil (a :: x) | Lt_hd : forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA (a :: x) (b :: y) | Lt_tl : forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA (a :: x) (a :: y) Arguments Relation_Operators.Ltl _%type_scope _%function_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.Lt_nil _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.Lt_hd _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _ _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.Lt_tl _%type_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope
remove : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> A -> list A -> list A
list_eq_dec : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall l l' : list A, {l = l'} + {l <> l'}
Inductive Forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := Forall_nil : Forall P nil | Forall_cons : forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> Forall P (x :: l) Arguments Forall [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments Forall_nil [A]%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Forall_cons [A]%type_scope [P]%function_scope _ [l]%list_scope
Inductive Exists (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := Exists_cons_hd : forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Exists P (x :: l) | Exists_cons_tl : forall (x : A) (l : list A), Exists P l -> Exists P (x :: l) Arguments Exists [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments Exists_cons_hd [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments Exists_cons_tl [A]%type_scope [P]%function_scope _ [l]%list_scope
filter_ext_in : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool) (l : list A), (forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a) -> filter f l = filter g l
map_ext_in : forall (A B : Type) (f g : A -> B) (l : list A), (forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a) -> map f l = map g l
filter_ext_in_iff : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool) (l : list A), filter f l = filter g l < -> (forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a)
in_insertion : forall (A : Set) (x : A) (l : list A), In x l -> exists l' : list A, insertion A x l' l
NoDup_Permutation : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A), NoDup l -> NoDup l' -> (forall x : A, In x l <-> In x l') -> Permutation l l'
app_comm_cons : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A) (a : A), a :: x ++ y = (a :: x) ++ y
FinFun.Injective = fun (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) => forall x y : A, f x = f y -> x = y : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> Prop Arguments FinFun.Injective {A B}%type_scope _%function_scope
ext_in_filter : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool) (l : list A), filter f l = filter g l -> forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a
Add_inv : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l : list A), In a l -> exists l' : list A, Add a l' l
in_map_iff : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (y : B), In y (map f l) < -> (exists x : A, f x = y /\ In x l)
ext_in_map : forall (A B : Type) (f g : A -> B) (l : list A), map f l = map g l -> forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a
FinFun.Full = fun (A : Type) (l : list A) => forall a : A, In a l : forall A : Type, list A -> Prop Arguments FinFun.Full {A}%type_scope _%list_scope
Add_in : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> forall x : A, In x l' < -> In x (a :: l)
ListDec.decidable_eq = fun A : Type => forall x y : A, Decidable.decidable (x = y) : Type -> Prop Arguments ListDec.decidable_eq _%type_scope
FinFun.Surjective = fun (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) => forall y : B, exists x : A, f x = y : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> Prop Arguments FinFun.Surjective {A B}%type_scope _%function_scope
Inductive Desc (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := d_nil : Relation_Operators.Desc A leA nil | d_one : forall x : A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (x :: nil) | d_conc : forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil) Arguments Relation_Operators.Desc _%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.d_nil _%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.d_one _%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.d_conc _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _ _%list_scope
nth_error_split : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (n : nat) (a : A), nth_error l n = Some a -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ a :: l2 /\ length l1 = n
tail_insertion : forall (A : Set) (x y : A) (l l' : list A), insertion A x l l' -> insertion A x (y :: l) (y :: l')
FinFun.Surjective_list_carac : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B), FinFun.Surjective f < -> (forall lB : list B, exists lA : list A, incl lB (map f lA))
rev_app_distr : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A), rev (x ++ y) = rev y ++ rev x
Inductive clos_refl (A : Type) (R : Relation_Definitions.relation A) (x : A) : A -> Prop := r_step : forall y : A, R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl A R x y | r_refl : Relation_Operators.clos_refl A R x x Arguments Relation_Operators.clos_refl _%type_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.r_step _%type_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.r_refl _%type_scope
FinFun.bInjective = fun (n : nat) (f : nat -> nat) => forall x y : nat, x < n -> y < n -> f x = f y -> x = y : nat -> (nat -> nat) -> Prop Arguments FinFun.bInjective _%nat_scope _%function_scope

intros A P H a.
